content: Personally, I consider a Medium membership to be much better value than a subscription to the Washington Post, whose bias is apparent in nearly every headline and every article. I wouldn’t pay a penny for that. Here’s an article that supports the idea we’ll be paying for quality content one way or the other. It’s up to you to decide what you consider quality. https://www.theinformation.com/escaping-the-digital-media-crap-trap
